data_description.scan_interval: How often to check Home/Away and HVAC state. Each check uses 2 API calls. 3600s (1h) is recommended to stay within the 100 calls/day limit (uses 48 calls), leaving a buffer for manual actions.
data_description.slow_poll_interval: How often to check batteries and device info. This uses 1 extra API call. 24h is highly recommended to minimize API load.

data_description.scan_interval: Interval for presence and heating state. Lowering this increases API pressure.
data_description.slow_poll_interval: Interval for battery and metadata. Batteries last weeks, so 24h is sufficient.

manual_poll.name: Manual Poll
manual_poll.description: Force an immediate update from the Tado API.

resume_all_schedules.name: Resume All Schedules
resume_all_schedules.description: Remove all manual overlays in all zones and return to Smart Schedule.
